Constructor Detail

ProcessVariableAdress

public ProcessVariableAdress(java.lang.String rawName,
                             ControlSystemEnum controlSystem,
                             java.lang.String device,
                             java.lang.String property,
                             java.lang.String characteristic)
Constructs a process variable address using the provided information pieces.

Parameters:
rawName - the raw address (mandatory)
controlSystem - the control system (mandatory)
device - a device name (optional, provide null to leave it out)
property - the property part of the address (mandatory)
characteristic - the characteristics part of the address (optional, provide null to leave it out)

public org.epics.css.dal.context.RemoteInfo toDalRemoteInfo()
